entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
